name: rewrite_resource
description:
Completely replaces an existing resource's contents or creates a new resource for one data source. Use with caution as this overwrites the entire resource. Always check existing resource contents before using this tool. For partial changes, prefer search_and_replace.
IMPORTANT:
- Must provide complete resource content including ALL imports, types, and code
- Never use placeholder comments like "// Previous code remains..."
- Never assume code exists outside what is provided in content
- Cannot preserve any existing code that isn't explicitly included in content
- Will completely delete and replace the entire resource
For modifying specific parts of a resource, use search_and_replace instead.
DANGER: Completely replaces resource contents.
REQUIRED STEPS:
1. Use load_resources to show current content
2. In <thinking> tags show:
   - Diff/comparison with planned changes
   - Justification for complete rewrite
3. If skipping steps 1-2, tool will fail.

When no data source is specified, operates on the primary data source.
